ptolemy.plot

Class PlotPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.plot.PlotPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PlotPoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A simple structure for storing a plot point.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 0.2
    Author:
    Edward A. Lee
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    Pt.AcceptedRating:
    Yellow (cxh)
    Pt.ProposedRating:
    Yellow (cxh)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean connected
      True if this point is connected to the previous point by a line.
      double[] derivatives
      d^n y/dx^n for n > 0.
      boolean errorBar
      True if the yLowEB and yHighEB fields are valid.
      double originalx
      Original value of x before wrapping.
      double x
      X value after wrapping (if any).
      double y
      Y value.
      double yHighEB
      Error bar Y low value.
      double yLowEB
      Error bar Y low value.
